input_email_body:
Subject: Billing Issue

Hello Customer Support, I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to report an incorrect billing issue with my account <acc_num>, specifically concerning the AWS Management Service You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. It seems there are discrepancies between the charges and my actual usage, and I would appreciate a detailed clarification. Could you please provide a breakdown of the service usage and the corresponding charges? Please contact me at your earliest convenience at <tel_num>. Thank you for addressing this matter promptly. Best regards, <name>. My name is Maria Gonzalez.
